name: Weekend Workshop
venue: Chandigarh Group of Colleges, Kharar Banur Hwy, Sector 112, Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Punjab 140307
summery: In this workshop, you will experience the entire product development lifecycle, right from getting a feature request from your product manager, to building, testing, and pushing the feature out, in a work-like environment, with guidance from Tech Leads and Crio.
description: We are thrilled to introduce a one-of-a-kind online workshop, on 11th and 12th January, where you can experience what it takes to build real products features in a work-like environment, and learn key programming & software engineering concepts along the way.
